backgrounds.name: Allies
backgrounds.description: Close companions who could be called on for most anything.

backgrounds.name: Contacts
backgrounds.description: Those willing to help for a favor in return.

backgrounds.name: Fame
backgrounds.description: How well-known the character is in society; its counterpart Notoriety generally carries negative connotation.

backgrounds.name: Influence
backgrounds.description: A character's ability to affect mortal society.  Elder Vampires can enjoy influence around the world.

backgrounds.name: Mentor
backgrounds.description: An experienced guide through the supernatural or everyday world.

backgrounds.name: Resources
backgrounds.description: How much a character has to live on.

backgrounds.name: Status
backgrounds.description: Where a character ranks in a particular social structure.
